disp-quote.p: " Even if I were to be asked again, I would not say no. I don't know …I feel it's my professional obligation to not refuse any work …I as [name of participant] am not here to be selective in my work and to work only with stable, noninfectious cases…In the end, you as a nurse should provide care not only to stable patients but to all patients, whether they have H1N1 or COVID-19 or AIDS” (NH10).
